noticeDescription: Take Notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-laws 335-2018 and 336-2018 to designate the property at 68 Daisy Avenue (Vincent Massey Childcare Centre) as being of cultural heritage value or interest, and to provide for a heritage easement agreement for the property.

otherReferenceList.description: MM38.27 - 68 Daisy Avenue - Amendment to Intention to Designate under Part IV, Section 29 of the Ontario Heritage Act
By-law 335-2018 - To designate the property at 68 Daisy Avenue (Vincent Massey Childcare Centre) as being of cultural heritage value or interest
By-law 336-2018 - To provide for the entering into of a heritage easement agreement for the conservation of the property known municipally as 68 Daisy Avenue

subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act R.S.O. 1990, Chapter 0.18 and City of Toronto, Province of Ontario 68 Daisy Avenue (Vincent Massey Childcare Centre)
title: Notice of Passing - 68 Daisy Avenue (Vincent Massey Childcare Centre)
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
